content:
Diagnosis:
Gastric adenocarcinoma T4aN2M0, MSI high, EBV positive

Previous treatment:
Neoadjuvant FLOT chemotherapy completed March 2024
Total gastrectomy April 2024

Current medications:
Pantoprazole 40mg daily
Monthly B12 injections

Current situation:
Post-operative follow-up

I reviewed [redacted name] today in the surgical oncology follow-up clinic. He is now 12 weeks post-gastrectomy and making good progress with recovery. His weight has stabilized at 72kg with appropriate nutritional supplementation and dietary modifications. He is managing 5-6 small meals per day with minimal dumping symptoms. Performance status has improved to PS 0. Blood tests show stable parameters with appropriate B12 levels on replacement. No concerning features on examination today. The plan is to continue current management and arrange surveillance CT in 3 months' time. We will review him again following the scan.
